A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Once the initial Star Wars charm wears off\, you start to realize that there's no rhyme or reason to anything in The Last Jedi.  Incredibly cringe-worthy dialogue\, Luke was completely out of character. (there's a reason Mark Hamill hated this film) Plot holes galore.  Rian Johnson clearly didn't know a thing about the Star Wars universe.  The dialogue felt incredibly hip\, and modern; this is Star Wars\, not Earth 2017.  Ham-handed romance just to say there was a romance subplot.  It was hardly even structurally sound from a writing/screenwriting perspective.  I'm sad to say - it was garbage.  Utter garbage.
